headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHWARTZ, FLORENCE PART

lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Florence Part, beloved mother of Edward, Susan and Steven, their spouses Judy, Jonathan and Jil, grandmother of Lisa, Samantha, Sarah and Benjamin, passed away on Friday December 27th. She was preceded in death by her dear husband Bernard. Born July 24, 1921, she was a proud alumna of Hunter College, a lifelong liberal, lover of ballet and all things New York. She will be deeply missed by her children and grandchildren. Both of their memories are a blessing to us all. A memorial service will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel at 1pm on January 3 followed by interment at Cedar Park Cemetery in Paramus, New Jersey.
